itunes:title: Easily Distracted by New Releases
title: Easily Distracted by New Releases
description:
In Episode 24 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are sharing a few of their recently read new releases! They share what they're loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about why theyâ€™re so easily distracted by new releases.

*Support us on Patreon ! We would love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus content including bonus episodes, Zoom get togethers, an engaging private Facebook group to interact with other listeners and more for just $5 a month!

*The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!

Loving Lately
4:40 No Bake Energy Balls (R)
7:00 Youth to the People Skincare (T)

Latest Reads
10:10 Out | Natsuo Kirino (T)
14:40 The Wish | Nicholas Sparks (R)

20:46 Book Talk
33:48 The Royals Next Door | Karina Halle (T)
37:10 The Book of Magic | Alice Hoffman (R)
43:52 We Are Not Like Them | Jo Piazza & Christine Pride (T)
51:53 Last Girl Ghosted | Lisa UngerÂ  (R)
57:00 All Her Little Secrets | Wanda Morris (T)
1:00:44 A Town Called Solace | Mary LawsonÂ  (R)Â 

Shelf Additions
1:06:24 How do I Un-Remember This? | Danny Pellegrino Â  (T)
1:08:00 Cherish Farrah | Bethany MorrowÂ  (R)Â 

Other Mentions
Confessions | Kanae Minuto
Hamnet | Maggie O'Farrell
The Rules of Magic | Alice Hoffman
Magic Lessons | Alice Hoffman
Anne at anneaustex on Instagram (Renee's recommendation source for A Town Called Solace)
The Mysterious Bookshop
